title: is banning this champ bannabe
body:
i was in a draft autofilled to support and was last ban
this was while {{champion:92}} was free week
{{champion:92}} who was 3rd pick was begging me to ban {{champion:122}}  when i wanted to try {{champion:122}} support cause my only support {{champion:201}}  was banned already which was banned by the {{champion:92}} player
i ban{{champion:92}} so that the other team does not get her she was 4th pick overall and the likelihood of her getting her and doing well is very slim
the {{champion:92}}  player RAGES and when game starts starts to int cause they got {{champion:122}} and their {{champion:122}}  was first pick and even said he was gona pick up {{champion:92}} if she was not banned

i ended up going {{champion:240}} support and almost won game with my adc

is what i did bannable?

replies.body:
It is not punishable in any way (playing off-meta is fine as long as you do not intentionally troll or feed),  banning someone's pick is a bit rude, but since it was riven, you probably did everyone a favor.

Tilting rive scrubs is very important.
